meanings.sent1: I love how fluffy a catface can be.
meanings.sent2: The catface looked so cute in the sunlight.
meanings.sent3: The catface seemed to be smiling at me.
meanings.sent4: Her catface lit up with joy when she saw her owner.
meanings.sent5: The catface had a mischievous glint in its eyes.

meanings.definition: A symbol resembling a cat's face, often used in online communication.
meanings.sent1: She sent me a message with a catface emoji.
meanings.sent2: The catface icon made the chat more fun.
meanings.sent3: The catface emoji always makes me laugh.
meanings.sent4: His text was full of catface symbols.
meanings.sent5: The catface emoticon added a playful touch to the conversation.

meanings.definition: A type of plant with flowers resembling a cat's face.
meanings.sent1: The garden had a beautiful catface plant.
meanings.sent2: The catface flowers bloomed in various colors.
meanings.sent3: The catface plant made the garden look whimsical.
meanings.sent4: She admired the delicate petals of the catface blooms.
meanings.sent5: The catface plant attracted butterflies with its unique flowers.
